        Constructor for ObstacleAvoider.
        Parameters:
        navigator - The robot's navigator.
        odometer - The robot's odometer.
        usSensor - The US sensor that will detect the walls in front of the robot.

    • Method Detail

      • avoid

        public void avoid()
        Makes the robot avoid obstacles while trying to reach the navigator's current target. Waits until the navigator reaches its target to terminate.
